:::HeraldAngel/Child:::

::Child feels a bigger shift in the balance of power::
Child: Dad, your friend has gone too far
Herald: What should i do son?
Child: Give him a fair warning.  Ask him what he is doing with the Matrix.
::HeraldAngel opens up a comm::
Herald:  Hey Arc- Angel Prime.  Sorry if this is a bad time.  How did you get 
the Matrix and what do you intend on using it for?

--part1_34.d504f74.27533330_boundary
